channel.title: Blog on Kaarel's blog and portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Kaarel's blog and portfolio

item.title: Setting up my homepage
item.description: Today is the day I finally make my first post on my own page. Technically, it is not 100% mine, because I used Hugo and custom theme for setup. The reason I’m using Hugo is that it requires a bit more effort on the technical side, which is a bonus on my journey to learn programming. Even though there’s a lot of materials on the internet to setup a simple blog on Hugo, It still took me several evenings to figure out the final layout settings.
